replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
确认自己版本是1.8.1
装Modloader audiomod 和ModloaderMP http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-5431-1-1.html 这里有
下载mod 解压 打开 有个client文件夹 打开
将“place in mods” 里的扔进%appdata%/.minecraft/mods里 没有的话自己创建该文件夹
将 “place in resources”的扔进%appdata%/.minecraft/resources 里 这些都是声音文件
开始游戏玩去吧

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
看官網說明或內附說明文件... 

Installation:
Client (This is what most of you are looking for):

This covers the basic method of installation. More can be found in the installtion.txt file in the download.
1. ModLoader, Audiomod and ModLoaderMp has to be installed beforehand. The client has to be started at least once after.
2. Open the "Client" folder.
3. Copy the contents of "place in mods" (the stuff in that folder, not the folder itself) to "/minecraft/mods"
4. Copy the contents of "place in resources" to "/minecraft/resources"
5. Play. If you are still unsure, watch the installation videos on the top of the post.
